thread.section_title: Ibis Styles London Leyton - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Affordable and clean
thread.title_full: Affordable and clean - Review of Ibis Styles London Leyton, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Santhosh K
title: Affordable and clean
text:
We stayed for 3 nights. This is a clean property, decent guests,helpful staff, strong WiFi, breakfast was basic, parking available.
Close to KFC, drums pub and many groceries.
Nearest bus stop is Bakers Arms- which is 100 meters to hotel and from there to the leyton stone tube it is 5mts ride.
